TopicTitle: Kerbal Jank Program: KSP with 5 random failure mods (format: Short memey videos)

Articles.Content:
That should be a link to the playlist. The first 7, very short videos are up! I am to now release approximately one a day for the forseeable future assuming nothing major happens and assuming I can stick to this. The major mods are listed in the first video and on the thumbnail, but to recap:

I am playing KSP with:

  • BARIS
  • Oh Scrap
  • Dang It!
  • Kerbal Launch Failure
  • Kerbalism

Five random failure mods. I tried to get eight working but couldn't. For difficulty I also have:

  • Principia (my first time with Principia)
  • Deadly Re-Entry
  • Simplex Tech Tree and science gains reduced to 40% (really slow early game, probably should not have done that)
  • ResearchBodies
  • Kerbal Krash System
  • OPM

And I'm also restricting reverts and quickloads, as my suffering makes for entertaining content.

I tried to get FAR working but for some reason it made my parachutes stop working, so I removed it, and the science component of Kerbalism is disabled because I couldn't get it to detect my antennas, so I couldn't transmit data.

Enjoy!

This is such a fun idea!

11 hours ago, Ultimate Steve said:
  • Principia (my first time with Principia)

Since you have Lagrange points, and the timing is almost perfect, I think a lot of people (myself included, obviously) would enjoy a compilation of many attempts to launch this:

Also fun would be a running scoreboard of how many mission failures each mod has caused, if that's not too much trouble to calculate.

I have like a 15 episode long backlog of video I have not edited yet, but I will put this in! Although if it is late in the tech tree I won't get to it for a while. I do have the ResearchBodies telescopes, though...

As for the scoreboard, hold on, I can try to make a spreadsheet, although it may take a while...

I'm glad y'all are enjoying!

I took a break off of the daily episodes for Christmas, but I'm back now, and I've posted up to episode 11:
Up to Episode 16 is out, and I've successfully put Jeb on the Mun!
I had an idea, every time you achieve a certain milestone, you install another random failure mod
